languages.text: {n}Глаза сестры вспыхивают.{/n} "Как же счастлива я буду наконец-то найти ответ, которым {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g} задавалась тысячелетиями! Скорее бы отыскать дорогу на Салис Прайм... Губительные силы, без сомнения, нарочно мешают нам. Стоят на пути веры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза сестры вспыхивают.{/n} "Как же счастлива я буду наконец-то найти ответ, которым {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g} задавалась тысячелетиями! Скорее бы отыскать дорогу на Салис Прайм... Губительные Силы, без сомнения, нарочно мешают нам. Стоят на пути веры".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза сестры вспыхивают.{/n} "Как же счастлива я буду наконец-то найти ответ, которым {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g} задавалась тысячелетиями! Скорее бы отыскать дорогу на Салис Прайм... Губительные силы, без сомнения, нарочно мешают нам. Стоят на пути веры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I will be so happy to have finally found the answer that the Ecclesiarchy has been pondering for millennia! I hope we find the way to Salis Prime soon... the warp must be working against us on purpose. It stands in the way of faith."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I will be so happy to have finally found the answer that the Ecclesiarchy has been pondering for millennia! I hope we find the way to Salis Prime soon... the warp must be working against us on purpose. It stands in the way of faith."

I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}她的双眼闪闪发光。{/n}“这个问题几千年来一直在困扰着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}。我认为，当我找到这个问题的答案时，就完成了我的使命！我祈祷我们能尽快找到通往萨利斯主星的航路……毁灭之力肯定会联合起来阻止我们，他们肯定会阻挡信仰的道路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的双眼闪闪发光。{/n}“这个问题几千年来一直在困扰着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}。我认为，当我找到这个问题的答案时，就完成了我的使命！我祈祷我们能尽快找到通往萨利斯主星的航路……毁灭之力肯定会联合起来阻止我们，他们肯定会阻挡信仰的道路。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the Ecclesiarchy for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos brillan con luz propia.{/n} «¡Creo que mi labor habrá concluido cuando encuentre la respuesta que ha eludido a la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} durante milenios! Rezo para que encontremos pronto el camino a Salis Prime... Los Poderes Ruinosos se alinean en nuestra contra. Se oponen a la fe».
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos brillan con luz propia.{/n} «¡Creo que mi labor habrá concluido cuando encuentre la respuesta que ha eludido a la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g} durante milenios! Rezo para que encontremos pronto el camino a Salis Prime... Los Poderes Ruinosos se alinean en nuestra contra. Se oponen a la fe».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの目が輝く。{/n}「何千年もの間、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}も見出すことのできていない答えを見つけたとき、私の使命は果たされるような気がしているのだ！サリス・プライムへの道が早く見つかることを祈る…〈禍つ神々〉は我々を妨げてくるだろう。奴らは我らの信仰を阻む者だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの目が輝く。{/n}「何千年もの間、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}も見出すことのできていない答えを見つけたとき、私の使命は果たされるような気がしているのだ！サリス・プライムへの道が早く見つかることを祈る…〈禍つ神々〉は我々を妨げてくるだろう。奴らは我らの信仰を阻む者だ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ihre Augen funkeln.{/n} "Ich spüre, dass ich meine Aufgabe erfüllen kann, wenn ich die Antwort finde, welche der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} seit Jahrtausenden verborgen bleibt! Ich bete, dass wir bald den Weg nach Salis Prime finden ... Die Mächte der Zerstörung müssen sich gegen uns verschworen haben. Sie stehen dem Glauben im Weg."
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Augen funkeln.{/n} "Ich spüre, dass ich meine Aufgabe erfüllen kann, wenn ich die Antwort finde, welche der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} seit Jahrtausenden verborgen bleibt! Ich bete, dass wir bald den Weg nach Salis Prime finden ... Die Mächte der Zerstörung müssen sich gegen uns verschworen haben. Sie stehen dem Glauben im Weg."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une lueur étincelante illumine son regard.{/n} « Je crois que ma mission sera accomplie le jour où je trouverai la réponse qui échappe à l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} depuis un millénaire ! Je prie pour que nous trouvions rapidement le chemin de Salis Prime... Les Puissances de la Ruine doivent être alignées contre nous. Elles se dressent sur la voie de la piété. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lueur étincelante illumine son regard.{/n} « Je crois que ma mission sera accomplie le jour où je trouverai la réponse qui échappe à l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g} depuis un millénaire ! Je prie pour que nous trouvions rapidement le chemin de Salis Prime... Les Puissances de la Ruine doivent être alignées contre nous. Elles se dressent sur la voie de la piété. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın gözleri ışıldıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi'nin{/g} cevabını binlerce yıldır aradığı bu sorunun yanıtını nihayet ortaya çıkardığımda vazifemi yerine getirmiş olacağım. Dilerim Salis Prime'a giden yolu bir an evvel buluruz... Yıkıcı Güçler bize karşı saf almıştır. İnanca geçit vermemeye çalışacaklardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Her eyes gleam.{/n} "I feel that my undertaking will be fulfilled when I find the answer that has eluded the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g} for millennia! I pray we find the way to Salis Prime soon... The Ruinous Powers must be aligned against us. They stand in the way of faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözleri ışıldıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g}'nin cevabını binlerce yıldır aradığı bu soruya nihayet bir yanıt bulduğumda vazifemi yerine getirmiş olacağım. Dilerim Salis Prime'a giden yolu bir an evvel buluruz... Yıkıcı Güçler bize karşı saf almıştır. İnanca geçit vermezler."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
